articles.title: ESA's Cheops finds an unexpected ring around dwarf planet Quaoar - European Space Agency

articles.title: European stocks higher after Fed Chair Powell's comments; FTSE hits record high - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were higher Wednesday as investors digested the latest comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell, while the U.K.'s FTSE hit a new high.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sophie Tanno, Mick Krever, Radina Gigova, Yulia Kesaieva, Lauren Kent
articles.title: Zelensky thanks UK for support on behalf of Ukraine's 'war heroes' on surprise visit to London - CNN
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky made a surprise visit to the UK on Wednesday, sweeping in to London on the first stage of an unannounced diplomatic tour of European capitals with a powerful message for British lawmakers.
